paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the TTR gene variant Tyr114Cys, including penetrance data and individual case details.

patients.phenotype: nonfamilial amyloidosis with bilateral optic neuropathy

individual_records.phenotype_details: bilateral glass wool-like vitreous opacities and optic atrophy
individual_records.evidence_sentence: Genetic testing revealed a Tyr114Cys mutation in the transthyretin gene.

functional_data.summary: The Tyr114Cys mutation is associated with amyloidosis, leading to visual impairment.

variants.additional_notes: The penetrance is inferred from the single case report.
key_quotes: Genetic testing revealed a Tyr114Cys mutation in the transthyretin gene.
In our patient, both nonextensive and extensive PPV could not prevent the recurrence of bilateral intraocular amyloid deposits.

extraction_metadata.notes: The extraction was straightforward as the paper provided clear information on the TTR variant.
